meanings.definition: The quality of forming a united whole.
meanings.sent1: The cohesivenesses of the team was evident in their seamless collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The cohesivenesses of the ingredients in the recipe ensured a delicious outcome.
meanings.sent3: The cohesivenesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete.
meanings.sent4: The cohesivenesses of the family bond held them together through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The cohesivenesses of the colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.

meanings.definition: The state of sticking together firmly.
meanings.sent1: The cohesivenesses of the glue kept the broken pieces together.
meanings.sent2: The cohesivenesses of the tape prevented the papers from falling apart.
meanings.sent3: The cohesivenesses of the stickers made decorating fun and easy.
meanings.sent4: The cohesivenesses of the bandage secured the wound tightly.
meanings.sent5: The cohesivenesses of the magnets held the notes on the fridge.

meanings.definition: The ability to work well together as a group.
meanings.sent1: The cohesivenesses of the team allowed them to achieve their goals efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The cohesivenesses of the choir members resulted in a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent3: The cohesivenesses of the ants working together amazed the observers.
meanings.sent4: The cohesivenesses of the students during the project impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The cohesivenesses of the gears in the machine ensured smooth operation.
